product_name: Saris Gran Fondo 2 Bike Trunk Rack
long_description: The Saris Gran Fondo rack carries 2 bikes vertically on the rear of your car-between the taillights and license plate. Unique design is stable and means you don't have to remove bike wheels. Contoured wheel trays and ratcheting straps securely hold bikes with 700c and 26- and 29-in. tires without touching the bike frame. Large cradles and ratcheting anti-sway straps secure and stabilize bikes during transport. Rack folds up compactly when not in use. Saris Gran Fondo trunk rack carries 2 bikes up to 35 lbs. each. Built with lightweight, rust-resistant materials.
short_description: The Saris Gran Fondo rack carries 2 bikes vertically on the rear of your car-between the taillights and license plate. Unique design is stable and means you don't have to remove bike wheels.
